title: Rank doesn't really feel like it's fair ...
body:
Just had a game where my ADC died, got tilted, and began to intentionally feed despite no one flamed her for dying. If that wasn't bad enough, our fed jungler disconnected when we _might_ of had a chance in a 4v5. 

We had to surrender, just us 3 that were left ... how's this fair?

This makes me question if rank holds any value really. This isn't the first time people got mad, started to throw / do stupid things, or just rage quit because they didn't feel like playing in my line of games. Hell, I felt bad when one game had both an ADC and Support disconnect on the other team, ensuring that their allies lost. The game didn't feel satisfying, it felt like a cheap win and I knew we didn't win fairly. While this isn't Riot's fault, I just don't know if Rank could be taken seriously when stuff like this happens more often than I would like it to.

replies.body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/lEfmarRU-group-therapy-super-salty-mega-thread-blow-off-steam put your salt where it belongs

Ranked is fair because these things balance out. Part of climbing is helping your team stay cool.

Want it to be taken more seriously?

Tell people to change their personalities, if they don't oh well you tried... the end.
